name: Ollie and the Merchant of Dreams
name_original: Ollie and the Merchant of Dreams
description:
This is a metroidvania style game inspired by the likes of "Momodora: Reverie Under The Moonlight" and "Wonder Boy in Monster World." This title is still in the alpha stage.

Many of the features are already implemented in the game but they are excluded in this alpha version because of spoilers and because they would enter into play later in the game. The current game features only an introductory stage.  Comments or feedback is appreciated.
